Period of Reference not set in the preferences. Considering default period.
There is no category available for filtering in the report.
There is no project available for filtering in the report.

Last 4 digits of the card number
This will delete the attribute from categories and transactions as well.

Define sort order for locations list
Define sort order for templates list
Check to protect access with PIN
Can not connect to Google Drive.
The backup folder on Google Drive was not found.
Please set Google account login and password in the preferences.

Add sub categories result to the result of a root category
Consider null result when generating statistics (min, max and mean)

Define the reference currency to be considered when request data for report charts

Open account with negative opening amount

Day on which the bill closes

Custom closing day must be different from regular closing day.
Please set payment and closing days for this credit card on account properties.

Enable one-tap menu in the Blotter

Delete transactions from account %s prior to AND including %s.

Allows read-only access to all files on your Google Drive.

Financisto requires a few permissions to be granted manually.
Please grant the required permissions below, then return back to the previous screen and repeat the operation. Permissions can be revoked in the system Settings -> App Permissions.
Required to read and write backup files from/to the external storage.
Required to take pictures and attach them to transactions.
Required to allow backup to your personal Google Drive.
Required for adding new transactions automatically by SMS templates.
Show menu button on the Accounts screen

Placeholders: 
{{p}} - price
{{a}} - account last digits
{{*}} - any symbols/words

Restore database from the local storage
Send database backup to email, etc
Import/export database to another format like csv, qif, etc
Make a voluntary donation to support the project
Get more information about the project
Please make sure to remember the pin. There is no way to recover your information or turn off the protection if you lose or forget the pin.
Remind if autobackup has not been enabled for a few days.
Notify if autobackup failed during the last execution.
You should consider enabling autobackup to Google Drive or Dropbox to keep your data safe. Go to Menu -> Preferences -> Backup.
Write external storage permisson not granted
Review permissions that needs to be granted manually
Use Fingerprint to unlock the application
Allow to use PIN to unlock the application even if the fingerprint is enabled.
At least one fingerprint needs to be enrolled
